attributes.action: consider dealth penalty for child killers/paedophiles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following on from several recent stories I find it difficult to understand that the rights of a child killer/paedophile are taken into consideration when they should lose all human rights the moment they commit these crimes! If you sympathise with them then you are just as bad a they are!!!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
